text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump This administration (and that includes you and the other Trump enablers) are responsible for as many coronavirus deaths as resulted from the dropping of an atomic bomb on Nagasaki. 
Want to spin that for me? 
Cos I've got plenty of time to listen to your excuses...
Go ahead on..
